name: Set cookie
description: Save a key/value pair as a non-http-only cookie (readable on the client). Useful for storing user preferences.

arguments.name: Value
arguments.description: The value to be stored in the cookie.

arguments.name: Expires in
arguments.description: (Optional) Time in seconds until the cookie expires. If this is null, the cookie will expire at the end of the user's session.

arguments.name: SameSite
arguments.description: (Optional) The SameSite attribute of the cookie. Defaults to Lax.

arguments.name: Path
arguments.description: (Optional) The Path attribute of the cookie. Defaults to /.

arguments.name: Include Subdomains
arguments.description: (Optional) Whether to include subdomains when setting the cookie. Defaults to true.

Success.description: This event is triggered once the cookie has been saved.

Error.description: This event is triggered if the cookie could not be saved.
